function.name: device_location
function.description: Get GPS coordinates and location information for the current device based on network/IP geolocation. Returns latitude, longitude, city, region, country, timezone, ISP, and more.

operation.description: Operation to perform: get_location (returns GPS coordinates and detailed location info)

provider.description: Geolocation provider to use (default: ipapi). ipapi.co or ip-api.com
